bioconda.name: bioconductor-qpcrnorm
bioconda.summary: Data-driven normalization strategies for high-throughput qPCR data.

biotools.summary: The package contains functions to perform normalization of high-throughput qPCR data. Basic functions for processing raw Ct data plus functions to generate diagnostic plots are also available.

bioschemas.name: qpcrNorm
bioschemas.summary: The package contains functions to perform normalization of high-throughput qPCR data. Basic functions for processing raw Ct data plus functions to generate diagnostic plots are also available.
